data.text:
TIME FOR A TURKISH GASTRO EXPERIENCE 🇹🇷 🥮
Ever tried Turkish cuisine? If you haven't, it's high time! If you have, you know it's the real deal! Try our new flights from Abu Dhabi to Ankara and pamper yourself with Turkish delicacies! 👉 https://t.co/AeMNWOKuvd https://t.co/EEtGEQWw5h
@KateM_28 Hi Kate! Yes, you can still take the return flight. Enjoy your travel and thank you for choosing us!

@Miles03801687 Hi There! We're truly sorry for the inconvenience. Due to the busy summer season, there may be delays in receiving responses from our customer relations team. However, without exception, all registered claims will be processed as soon as possible. We thank you for your patience.

data.text: @ThatPacmanDude Hi There! We apologize that you felt that WIZZ let you down on this occasion. We are doing our best to improve our customer experience and would like to learn more about where we fell short this time. We suggest you submit a complaint claim via the link: https://t.co/goYYi8Y6DI.

@marco_buta Hi Buta! We are sorry to hear about this. I If our cabin crew finds any items, they will leave them at one of the two airports. Please keep in touch with the Lost&Found departments of airports. We hope you will be reunited with your belongings soon!
